| HistoryText             = The Titanium Man Mutant-Defense Project was a [[Russian Armed Forces (Earth-616)|Russian military]] operation directed by [[Toma Zaslon (Earth-616)|Toma Zaslon]], the highest-ranking pro-mutant general in the army, since she was secretly a [[Homo sapiens|mutant]] herself. During a test run for the Titanium Men, General Zaslon was attacked by [[Arkady Rossovich (Earth-616)|Omega Red]]. When [[Victor Creed (Earth-616)|Sabretooth]] stepped in to try to stop him, he was attacked by the Titanium Men, though he managed to defeat all five of them.{{r|Weapon X Vol 3 19}}
